column5: This is a great board and not just for fishing.I needed some plumbing modifications made so I looked in the members business directory and came up with a Durham plumber-Jigger.He came over today fixed me up and had a great time yakking about fishing and home renovations,the neighbor even phoned and said he had a flat tire   -its great to have good neighbors and air in the garage.AND I won tickets to the fishing show  :D  vance

Doesn't surprise me at all that good karma would be coming your way, Vance. I seem to remember you chipping in way more than your fair share at charity auctions we've had here. You're a good dude...what goes around....   Thanks.

Youre absolutely right roy.What comes around goes...........I have seen it personally this week and I know now. I have friends in time of need.Very good friends from here and my personal life.Cheers to all on OFC.
Good job Jigger,makes us plumbers look good. Joe
Thanks for the mention Vance. Was a pleasure meeting you. Congrats on the free tickets! 'Tis a great site with some great people, thats for sure!
The two rules of plumbing, as taught to me by my late Dad: 1) Feces flows downhill 2) Never lick your tools
Actually #2 is don't bite your fingernails.  You can use your putty knife as a spoon after you clean it.   Art the plumber
